creditline: Gift of Mary and Robyn Campbell
description: view of a curve in a city street with three vehicles; shadowy figures standing and walking, some with umbrellas; bare trees and rain
inscription:
Signature, inscription and stamp
bottom edge in pencil: [PARISIAN SCENE PARIS \'37 ORIGINAL ETCHING ALBERT MARQUET 98-116]
markings: LRC on back, stamped in purple: [MADE IN FRANCE]
provenance: Mary and Robyn Campbell, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2003.
title: Street Scene, from "Paris 1937"
